panels.title: Size stats
Top $top_n tables by total size
Top $top_n tables by size change rate (absolute)
Top $top_n tables by table (w/o TOAST) size
Top $top_n tables by table (w/o TOAST) size change rate (absolute)
Top $top_n tables by TOAST size
Top $top_n tables by TOAST size change rate (absolute)
Top $top_n tables by index size
Top $top_n tables by index size change rate (absolute)
Estimated bloat stats
Top $top_n tables by estimated heap bloat %
Top $top_n tables by estimated heap bloat size
Tuple stats

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_ins{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuples inserts per second

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_del{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple deletes per second

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple HOT updates per second

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval]) - irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple non-HOT updates per second
IO stats

targets.expr:
topk($top_n, irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by block hits

targets.expr:
topk($top_n, irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
